3: וְנָק֥וּמָה <sup>6965 </sup> <n>And let us arise</n> וְנַעֲלֶ֖ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and go up</n> בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <sup>1008 </sup> <n>to Bethel</n> וְאֶֽעֱשֶׂה־ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>and I will make</n> שָּׁ֣ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> מִזְבֵּ֗חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>there an altar</n> לָאֵ֞ל <sup>410 </sup> <n>unto God</n> הָעֹנֶ֤ה <sup>6030 </sup> <n>who answered</n> אֹתִי֙ <sup>853 </sup> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>me in the day</n> צָֽרָתִ֔י <sup>6869 </sup> <n>of my distress</n> וַיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>been</n> עִמָּדִ֔י <sup>5978 </sup> <n>against</n> בַּדֶּ֖רֶךְ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>and was with me in the way</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>I</n> הָלָֽכְתִּי׃ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>which I went</n>
